title: PBE questions
body: I Really wanna ask something i have applied for the PBE servers and i know i have to w8  some time but i want to ask once i get accepted how am i ganna get to the 3rd step ? because from what i know the old league of legends page get's you the blitzcrank error and u cant do anything so it is ganna be ok then or is it ganna say that problem ? and plus i have waited for 4weeks now and still haven't goten  accepted because i haven't been reported or anything some times i just go afk though because i lag does that have to do anything with it? and yes tha's all of my question.

replies.body:
You'll receive an email to the email associated with your account if you've been accepted. You can usually work around the 500 Error by using a VPN such as [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us).

You can find more about how we select PBE testers and how the system works in our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any questions.
ok Thank you for your information i ididnt know what i could do without you :D
Are there any plans to allow PBE signups from servers other than NA and the two EU servers at any time or any alternate ways to do so already?
I haven't seen any announcements or red-posts regarding so, no. You can keep up with the PBE community on the [**PBE Boards.**](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/) ^.^
